<h3 id="X11037">X(11037)&nbsp;=&nbsp;HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: INCIRCLE-CIRCLES AND 2ND CONWAY</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^4+2*(b+c)*a^3+12*b*c*a^2-2*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a-(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :
<br>
<b>X(11037) = 4*R*X(1)+(4*R+r)*X(7) = (4*R+r)*X(8)-2*(6*R+r)*X(443)</b>
<p>X(11037) lies on these lines:{1,7}, {2,3333}, {3,10578}, {4,5045}, {8,443}, {10,10980}, {12,5704}, {56,3475}, {142,6762}, {145,8000}, {329,405}, {354,388}, {377,3889}, {452,4666}, {495,9780}, {496,5714}, {497,10404}, {553,1697}, {1058,5049}, {1125,5234}, {1191,4644}, {1210,5261}, {1219,4869}, {1385,5758}, {1387,9809}, {1699,9851}, {1788,4860}, {2550,6764}, {2551,3742}, {3085,3338}, {3086,5226}, {3091,5290}, {3218,10587}, {3295,9778}, {3303,3474}, {3304,3485}, {3306,7080}, {3337,10056}, {3361,3523}, {3421,5439}, {3486,5434}, {3622,5905}, {3626,11034}, {3870,6904}, {3957,4190}, {3976,7385}, {4031,5128}, {4208,4847}, {5082,9797}, {5083,9803}, {5129,10582}, {5250,9965}, {5274,9612}, {5557,5697}, {5586,9819}, {5657,5708}, {5691,6744}, {5768,10532}, {5809,11025}, {5811,5886}, {6361,6767}, {8165,9843}, {9799,11020}, {10449,11021}</p>
<p>
X(11037) = midpoint of X(1) and X(4355)<br>
X(11037) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1,7,962), (1,3600,5731), (1,4292,390), (1,4293,4313), (1,4294,8236), (1,4295,9785), (1,4298,20), (1,4317,4305), (1,4321,10884), (1,4334,4300), (1,4340,4344), (1,5542,11036), (4,5045,10580), (7,9785,4295), (8,9776,11024), (56,3475,5703), (354,388,938), (443,3555,8), (496,5714,9779), (942,1056,8), (942,11035,3555), (999,3487,3616), (1056,3296,942), (3085,3338,5435), (4295,9785,962), (5290,11019,3091), (5558,10580,5045)<br></p>
